p: 1-((1H-pyrazol-1-yl)methyl)-2-phenylcyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid (48). Purification by flash column chromatography using methanol/dichloromethane (2.5:97.5) with 0.01% formic acid allowed the isolation of the desired product as a light brown powder in 89% yield. 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 7.51 (s, 1H), 7.40 − 7.21 (m, 5H), 7.17 (s, 1H), 6.16 (s, 1H), 4.53 (d, J = 15.0 Hz, 1H), 3.68 (d, J = 15.1 Hz, 1H), 3.10 (t, J = 8.3 Hz, 1H), 1.92 (dd, J = 8.8, 5.4 Hz, 1H), 1.85 − 1.74 (m, 1H). 13 C NMR (101 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 177.8, 139.0, 135.1, 130.6, 129.2, 128.8, 127.7, 105.4, 50.5, 33.8, 31.0, 18.1. HRMS (ESI): calculated for C 14H 13O 2N 2 [M-H] 241.09715 found 241.09776.
